name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-content-moderation
title: Content Moderation
shortDescription: AI Builder prompt that helps moderate user-generated content for compliance with community guidelines
longDescription: Moderates user-generated content for compliance with community guidelines

metadata.value: Monitor and moderate the following user-generated content [content] , flagging any items that violate these community guidelines [guidelines]. At the top of the message, say if there is or isn't a violation with an explanation of any potential violations below.
